name: xdy-pf2e-workbench
description: Random assortment of possibly useful doodads, thingumabobs and whatchamacallits for the foundry vtt pf2e system.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:packs && vite build
scripts.build:packs: npm run build:packs-legacy && npm run build:packs-json
scripts.build:packs-json: npm run build:packs-json-xdy-internal-tables && npm run build:packs-json-xdy-pf2e-workbench-items && npm run build:packs-json-xdy-pf2e-workbench-macros && npm run build:packs-json-asymonous-benefactor-effects
scripts.build:packs-json-xdy-internal-tables: fvtt package pack --id xdy-pf2e-workbench --type Module -n xdy-internal-tables --in=./src/packs/leveldb/xdy-internal-tables --out=./dist/packs xdy-internal-tables
scripts.build:packs-json-xdy-pf2e-workbench-item: fvtt package pack --id xdy-pf2e-workbench --type Module -n xdy-pf2e-workbench-items --in=./src/packs/leveldb/xdy-pf2e-workbench-items --out=./dist/packs xdy-pf2e-workbench-items
scripts.build:packs-json-xdy-pf2e-workbench-macr: fvtt package pack --id xdy-pf2e-workbench --type Module -n xdy-pf2e-workbench-macros --in=./src/packs/leveldb/xdy-pf2e-workbench-macros --out=./dist/packs xdy-pf2e-workbench-macros
scripts.build:packs-json-asymonous-benefactor-ef: fvtt package pack --id xdy-pf2e-workbench --type Module -n asymonous-benefactor-effects --in=./src/packs/leveldb/asymonous-benefactor-effects --out=./dist/packs asymonous-benefactor-effects
scripts.watch: npm run build:packs && vite build --watch --mode development
scripts.lint: npm run lint:ts && npm run lint:json
